alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 1:59PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 158 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southwest of Utah Test and Training Range North, or 32 miles east of Wendover, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar and satellite indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Knolls, Utah Test and Training Range North, Clive, Utah Test and Training Range South and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 16 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
